features.featureTitle: Fix the “already have an active session for this event” start/resume behavior so that when a user starts (or resumes) a competition event, they can successfully access the scramble and proceed to the solve flow without getting stuck. Specifically: if the user already has an active in-progress session for (competitionId, event), the start/resume path must return (or otherwise allow the frontend to obtain) a valid session token and the solve flow must be able to fetch the current eligible scramble using that session token.
